thread.title: Social media and 5G in focus at Mobile World Congress

title: Social media and 5G in focus at Mobile World Congress
text:
Social media and 5G in focus at Mobile World Congress Monday, February 26, 2018 - 01:52 
Samsung Electronics has unveiled its flagship Galaxy S9 smartphone with an emphasis on visual applications for social media, hoping to attract tech-savvy young consumers to weather a market slowdown. But, as Ivor Bennett reports, from Barcelona, it’s got plenty of competition from others at the Mobile World Congress.
